data.text:
Friday 15 – Wednesday 20 September, 2023

Little White Lies recently described Lan Yu as ‘a milestone in Chinese queer cinema, [and] the pinnacle of Stanley Kwan’s aesthetic vision’. It follows the relationship between a wealthy older businessman and a young student as it goes further than either expected.

Screening in 4K.

Buy tickets

GFT, 12 Rose Street, G3 6RB

Share this:

This section: Cinema

Written by : Pat Byrne

Publisher of Pat's Guide to Glasgow West End; the community guide to the West End of Glasgow. Fiction and non-fiction writer.
